name: ART SIMULATOR 2017
description:
FINEST ART ACTION

MAKE ENDLESS COMPOSITIONS

HI-DEF NEXT GEN GRAPHICS

ART SIMULATOR 2017 is a free to play Unity game I made with custom assets. All models, lighting and scripts were written by me in a day for our 2D AMP foundations class. The goal of the randomly generated landscape was to show that in a random space - endless compositions can be made with your standard "art" terms. (Distance, shape-form, so on..)
